name: Hilde's Skitenne 1725m - Penken/Horberg
description:
Hilde's Skitenne is at 1725 meters above sea level and is located in the middle of the skiing area Horberg-Penken (piste no. 14). The traditional style and natural materials convey an ambience of a special kind, and make Hilde's ski Tenne a meeting place for young and old.
From the sun terrace you can enjoy a beautiful view of the Zillertal mountains. Sunbathers relax on sun loungers provided by us for free.

We offer an extensive food offer and Tyrolean specialties. In the preparation of our food, we ensure the highest quality and use predominantly local products. Particularly well known are our daily fresh grilled chicken, pizzas and Hilde's homemade apple and cheese strudel.

Speaking of which, a particularly popular spot is our umbrella bar. There's always something going on.

Summer 
closed 
no overnight stay possible
